testcase.classname: This feature will be used to test the login functionality of saucedemo application
testcase.name: Validate the Login success scenario
testcase.system-out: Given I have launched the application.......................................passed When I enter username.......................................................passed And I enter password........................................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should land on home page with welcome message........................passed When Login is ok take product put it cart product name is Sauce Labs Backpack.passed When I should click cart button.............................................passed Then Check product is avaible in cart.......................................passed

testcase.name: Validate the Login success scenario
testcase.system-out: Given I have launched the application.......................................passed When I enter username.......................................................passed And I enter password........................................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should land on home page with welcome message........................passed

testcase.classname: This feature will be used to test the login functionality of saucedemo application
testcase.name: Validate the Login failure scenario using examples
testcase.system-out: Given I have launched the application.......................................passed When I enter username as "standard_user"....................................passed And I enter password as "12345".............................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should get the error message as "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.classname: This feature will be used to test the login functionality of saucedemo application
testcase.name: Validate the Login failure scenario using examples 2
testcase.system-out: Given I have launched the application.......................................passed When I enter username as "locked_out_user"..................................passed And I enter password as "secret_sauce"......................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should get the error message as "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.".passed
